title: Fruit of the Loom Men's Cushioned Durable Cotton Work Gear Socks with Moisture Wicking
description: Fruit of the Loom socks are a trusted and reliable choice for comfortable and durable everyday wear. Crafted with high-quality materials, these socks offer a soft and cushioned feel against the skin. They are designed to provide a snug and secure fit, ensuring that they stay in place throughout the day.

These socks are specifically designed to withstand the rigors of machine washing and drying without losing their shape, color, or quality. With their durable construction, they can endure multiple washes and drying cycles while maintaining their softness and comfort.

The Fruit of the Loom men's work gear socks are built to withstand the toughest work conditions. The everyday work crew socks are constructed with a soft cotton/polyester blend and full cushioning to maximize comfort in your favorite work boots or shoes. Properties fight the toughest odors on the job, and the reinforced sole provides extra protection in high impact areas so you can outwork them all. Spandex is knitted throughout the sock to deliver the ultimate fit. 10 pairs per package.
